short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My favourite sport in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My sport extension will allow you to select your favourite sport and as soon as you open a new tab you will see beautiful images of your favourite sport. With clean layout, you will see your current weather, you can search the web and quickly access your favourite social media links.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the My Sport Chrome extension and setting Chrome™️ New Tab search to that provided by the service with results by Microsoft Bing, and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: https://itelligence.co/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://itelligence.co/terms-conditions/
